message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this fantastic product that I believe would be a great fit for you. I'm offering it to you for $12000. It's a steal considering its true value. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $9000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Hi Bob, I understand your offer, but $9000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $10500 to make this deal happen. It's a fair price considering the value of the product.  What do you think?

Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am still unable to meet your previous offer of $10500. However, I am willing to pay $10000 for the product. I hope this proposal is acceptable.
